entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The object that Harry initially thought was the Snitch, but it turned out to be a pair of glasses.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who appeared above Harry and spoke to him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story who is a student at Hogwarts and has a connection to the Stone.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts who has possession of the Stone.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: The nurse at Hogwarts who is mentioned as someone who might throw Dumbledore out if Harry doesn't calm down.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: The twin brothers of Harry who are his friends and admirers.

entities.name: hospital wing
entities.description: A location in Hogwarts where students go when they get hurt or ill.

entities.name: sweet-shop
entities.description: A store that sells sweets and treats.

relationships.description: Harry thought Quirrell had possession of the Stone, but it turned out to be a misunderstanding.
Harry is talking to Dumbledore in the hospital wing.
There was a conflict between Quirrell and Harry in the dungeons.
Harry is afraid of getting into trouble with Madam Pomfrey if he doesn't calm down.
Harry is friends with Fred and George.
